name: Turtle: Invaders
description:
A fixed-axis shooter with local netplay. Shoot at and destroy bats to earn points. Take a friend with you in online rivals to grab some power-ups and aim for the highest score! Can you survive to fight the evil Space Phoenix?

Notes: 

  • 3DS Homebrew version does not support online rivals mode
  • Rivals mode *should* work on most router connections.
